Test macro pass with special character substitutions only.

>>> pass_c.adoc

pass:c[char: < > &].

pass:c[replacement: (C) (R) (TM) -- ... -> => <- <= user's input].

<<< pass_c.html

<div class="paragraph">
<p>char: &lt; &gt; &amp;.</p>
</div>
<div class="paragraph">
<p>replacement: (C) (R) (TM) -- ... -&gt; =&gt; &lt;- &lt;= user's input.</p>
</div>
